import { useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; function Checkout({ product, quantity }) { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(""); const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); const { id } = useParams(); const totalAmount = product.price * quantity; console.log(product); return (

Welcome to the Checkout Page!

User Information

setName(e.target.value)} className="block w-full mb-4 py-2 px-2 border-2 " />
setEmail(e.target.value)} className="block w-full mb-4 py-2 px-2 border-2 " /> setPhone(e.target.value)} className="block w-full mb-4 py-2 px-2 border-2" />
setAddress(e.target.value)} className="block w-full mb-4 py-2 px-2 border-2 " />

quanity: {quantity}

subtotal: $ {totalAmount.toFixed(2)}

Total: $[total]
); } export default Checkout;
